If treat insulin , onset diabetes must occur age 40 body mass index must > 25kg/m2 time diagnosis . Diagnosed kidney attribute diabetes one follow criteria:3 Macroalbuminuria ( ACR > 300mg/g , ) Microalbuminuria ( ACR 30300 mg/g ) presence diabetic retinopathy ( although recognize 1/3 type 2 diabetic retinopathy fundoscopic exam ) . An elevated ACR confirm absence urinary tract infection 2 additional firstvoid specimen collect 36 month . At least 2 3 sample fall within range micro macroalbuminuria . An estimated Glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) 90 ml/min 30 ml/min measure ( GFR ( mL/min/1.73 m2 ) = 186 x ( Scr ) 1.154 x ( Age ) 0.203 x ( 0.742 female ) x ( 1.210 AfricanAmerican ) ( conventional unit ) .
